task_10_in_progress.status: PR #43 now has 79 tests: enum state + navigation + input buffer + UI toggles + command palette + edit menu + view cycling + scroll detail + search state + cycle methods + streams navigation + history navigation + stream filter label + history scroll + history detail. 246 tests across workspace.
